## Connection class

Basic HTTP connection to backend. This class is meant for extending and does not implement any username/password security.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class Connection 
```

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(url)](./forms42core.connection._constructor_.md) |  | Create connection. If no url specified, the Origin of the page is used |

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [authmethod](./forms42core.connection.authmethod.md) |  | string | The authorization method. Not used in the base class. |
|  [baseURL](./forms42core.connection.baseurl.md) |  | URL | <p>The base url for this connection</p><p> the baseurl of url</p> |
|  [headers](./forms42core.connection.headers.md) |  | any | Get the request headers |
|  [success](./forms42core.connection.success.md) | <code>readonly</code> | boolean | Whether the last request was successfull |
|  [transactional](./forms42core.connection.transactional.md) | <code>readonly</code> | boolean | Not used in base class |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [get(url, raw)](./forms42core.connection.get.md) |  | Perform HTTP GET |
|  [patch(url, payload, raw)](./forms42core.connection.patch.md) |  | Perform HTTP PATCH |
|  [post(url, payload, raw)](./forms42core.connection.post.md) |  | Perform HTTP POST |
